thread.title: Mike Wilkins

author: Mike Wilkins
title: Mike Wilkins
text:
Many thanks to you, Michelle, for trusting me with your lovely home and with your top dog Jag. Michelle keeps a lovely house and Jag is definitely one of the most intelligent and intuitive dogs I have ever become friends with. I have no hesitation in recommending Michelle's hospitality and Jag's company to anyone. I hope I get the opportunity to sit for Michelle and Jag in the future.
Regards
Mike Wilkins
